welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Marieville, Canada! Get ready to experience the charm of our beautiful city, known for its picturesque landscapes and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy the many wonders this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of St Jean Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, mainly serving regional and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access.
